title: The Itchen Bridge
text:
The 22nd of March 2024 marked 50 years since work began to construct the Itchen Bridge(Robertson 1976; Nicholson and Robertson 1977).
Southampton Museums & Archive page on the floating bridge as part of their Southampton Stories collection.
Song from 1977 the Woolston Ferry Gutta Percher & Balladeers on YouTube which references the Lowry painting.
Click and slide the blue slider to compare two images:


  
    
  
  
    
  

Click and slide the blue slider to compare two images:


  
    
  
  
    
  






References

Nicholson, T. H., and L. R. Robertson. 1977. “The Itchen Bridge, Southampton.” The Structural Engineer 55 (September). https://www.istructe.org/journal/volumes/volume-55-(published-in-1977)/issue-9/the-itchen-bridge-southampton-1-its-background-and/.


Robertson, Lawrence. 1976. “The Itchen Bridge, Southampton.” Chartered Municipal Engineer 103 (December).
